title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 125.1 - Posting of security
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 125.1 - Posting of security

State Regulations

Section
226
(2)
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law provides
that, in order to enter any not guilty plea, the motorist must post security in
the amount of $40. This provision is suspended so that if the plea is made on
time, security need not be posted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
125.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
